name: ProjectVoice
0:
”Alexa, ask Project Voice what is happening on Tuesday?”
”Alexa, ask Project Voice to tell me about Nick Laidlaw.”
”Alexa, ask Project Voice to tell me about the Emergence of Hearbles panel.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: project voice
des:
Here is how to use the Project Voice Alexa Skill - 

Once you've enabled the Project Voice App, you can ask about a speaker to hear their bio, ask about specific sessions by name or ask other questions about the conference. The Project Voice app features videos, audio recordings, and descriptions of speakers and sessions at the 2020 Project Voice Conference, as well as general information about the event.
 
To get started, open the skill by saying "Alexa, open Project Voice"
 
After the skill is open, you can ask about a speaker to hear or watch their bio, or ask about a specific talk you're interested in. Here are some questions you can ask your Alexa device once you've opened the skill:
 
• What’s happening on Tuesday?
• Tell me about the Emergence of Hearables Panel.
• Who is Nick Laidlaw?
• What is Adrian Simple presenting about?
• What is the fatherhood and technology talk?
• Tell me about the Both sides of the Stethoscope session.
• Tell me about the cloning voices talk.
• When does Project Voice start?
• Who are the keynote speakers?
• Where does Project Voice take place?


You can read the full list of speakers and sessions on the Project Voice 2020 website (https://www.projectvoice.ai/), then ask your Alexa Device about a speaker or session that you’d like to know more about! Project Voice will take place on January 13th-17th, 2020 in Chattanooga, Tennessee.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
